title: New upcoming skins in 6.17

embed.description: tails cycle color automatically!] Here's Riot LoveStrut with a bugs & feedback thread on Arcade Ahri: "PLAYER 1 SELECT: Arcade Ahri "If you'd like to play with me, you'd better be sure you know the game." There are no cheats or strats that can stop Arcade Ahri from getting what she wants, especially in the video game world.

body:
Seriously i just seen the new skins coming for the next patch which are on PBE right now... and i have to say they are god damn hilarious. 

Baker Pantheon??? Omg take my money... 

I about died laughing when i seen it. Instant buy for me.

The skins lately have been getting so god damn good it just boggles me, i know people think the paid content is really lame and most people don't think that people should put money into the game for things as trivial as skins but seriously they have been amazing the past couple patches, from new project, new arcade AND NOW we get a food based skin set??? More Chef skins! 

Ahhhhh just press on the link and look for your self guys they are so damn awesome.
